00015 - (NSMutableDictionary *)setPointObjectWithPositionX: (double)positionX 
00016                                                                                    positionY: (double)positionY 
00017                                                                                    positionZ: (double)positionZ 
00018                                                                                    velocityX: (double)velocityX 
00019                                                                                    velocityY: (double)velocityY 
00020                                                                                    velocityZ: (double)velocityZ
00021                                                                            accelerationX: (double)accelerationX 
00022                                                                            accelerationY: (double)accelerationY
00023                                                                            accelerationZ: (double)accelerationZ
00024 {
00025         NSArray *keys = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: @"positionX", @"positionY", @"positionZ",
00026                                          @"velocityX", @"velocityY", @"velocityZ", 
00027                                          @"accelerationX", @"accelerationY", @"accelerationZ", nil];
00028         NSArray *values = [[NSArray alloc] initWithObjects: [NSNumber numberWithDouble: positionX],
00029                                            [NSNumber numberWithDouble: positionY], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: positionZ],
00030                                            [NSNumber numberWithDouble: velocityX], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: velocityY],
00031                                            [NSNumber numberWithDouble: velocityZ], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: accelerationX],
00032                                            [NSNumber numberWithDouble: accelerationY], [NSNumber numberWithDouble: accelerationZ], nil];
00033         
00034         return [NSMutableDictionary dictionaryWithObjects: values forKeys: keys];
00035 }

00037 - (id)initWithPositionX: (double)positionX 
00038                           positionY: (double)positionY 
00039                           positionZ: (double)positionZ
00040                           velocityX: (double)velocityX
00041                           velocityY: (double)velocityY
00042                           velocityZ: (double)velocityZ
00043                   accelerationX: (double)accelerationX
00044                   accelerationY: (double)accelerationY 
00045                   accelerationZ: (double)accelerationZ
00046 {
00047         if (![super init])
00048         {
00049                 return nil;
00050         }
00051         
00052         pointObject = [self setPointObjectWithPositionX: positionX 
00053                                                                                   positionY: positionY 
00054                                                                                   positionZ: positionZ
00055                                                                                   velocityX: velocityX
00056                                                                                   velocityY: velocityY 
00057                                                                                   velocityZ: velocityZ
00058                                                                           accelerationX: accelerationX
00059                                                                           accelerationY: accelerationY
00060                                                                           accelerationZ: accelerationZ];
00061         
00062         return self;
00063 }

00111 {

00113         {
00114                 return nil;
00115         }
00116         
00117         pointObject = [self setPointObjectWithPositionX: 0.0
00118                                                                                   positionY: 0.0
00119                                                                                   positionZ: 0.0

00121                                                                                   velocityY: 0.0

00210 - (void)updateCoordinate: (NSString *)coordinate forDeltaTime: (NSTimeInterval)deltaTime
00211 {
00212         NSNumber        *newNumber;
00213         double          position;
00214         double          velocity;
00215         double          acceleration;
00216         
00217         NSString        *pos    = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat: @"position%@", coordinate];
00218         NSString        *vel    = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat: @"velocity%@", coordinate];
00219         NSString        *accel  = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat: @"acceleration%@", coordinate];
00220         
00221         newNumber               = [pointObject objectForKey: pos];
00222         position                = [newNumber doubleValue];
00223         newNumber               = [pointObject objectForKey: vel];
00224         velocity                = [newNumber doubleValue];
00225         newNumber               = [pointObject objectForKey: accel];
00226         acceleration    = [newNumber doubleValue];
00227 
00228         position                = position + (velocity * deltaTime) + ((acceleration * deltaTime * deltaTime) / 2.0);
00229         [pointObject setObject: [NSNumber numberWithDouble: position] forKey: pos];
00230         velocity                = velocity + (acceleration * deltaTime);
00231         [pointObject setObject: [NSNumber numberWithDouble: velocity] forKey: vel];
00232         
00233         [pos release];
00234         [vel release];
00235         [accel release];
00236 }
00237 
00238 - (void)computeStateForDeltaTime: (NSTimeInterval)deltaTime
00239 {
00240         [self updateCoordinate: @"X" forDeltaTime: deltaTime];
00241         [self updateCoordinate: @"Y" forDeltaTime: deltaTime];
00242         [self updateCoordinate: @"Z" forDeltaTime: deltaTime];
00243 }
